name: Giant Poisonous Frog
description: A large frog with toxic skin and a greenish hue, able to leap great distances and swim with agility.
memorable: Its toxic skin induces hallucinations and it can grapple or swallow prey.
goals: To ambush and consume unsuspecting creatures that come too close.
relations: May be found in marshes or near water bodies where other amphibious creatures reside.
strengths: Powerful grapple ability and toxic skin that can incapacitate attackers.
weaknesses: Average defenses and poorly rated intelligence and charisma.
attacks: A dangerous bite that inflicts both piercing and poison damage, with the ability to grapple.
most_powerful_ability: Toxic skin that poisons and causes hallucinations to attackers.
senses: Has darkvision, allowing it to see in the dark up to 30 feet.
skills: Moderate stealth skills allow it to move quietly in its environment.
additional_information: Amphibious nature allows it to live both in water and on land.
Standing leap capability makes it a surprising threat in combat.
Can swallow creatures, providing total cover from outside attacks.
It can pull creatures closer with its reeling tongue ability.
test_queries: giant amphibious creature with toxic skin
grappling frog that leaps great distances
